title: Robbery
author: VD
content_html:
40-yard completion to my WR. First and goal from the six.

5-yard penalty.

7-yard completion to my WR.

4-yard run by my brother’s RB. TD.





That’s a six-point switch. There is no justice. Not that I’m bitter….
content_text:
40-yard completion to my WR.  First and goal from the six.
5-yard penalty.
7-yard completion to my WR.
4-yard run by my brother’s RB.  TD.
That’s a six-point switch.  There is no justice.  Not that I’m bitter….
